setOption

Status setOption(User user,
                 java.lang.String key,
                 java.lang.String value)
Set an option.

Parameters:
user - The user.
key - The option key.
value - The option value.
Returns:
Status of the request. If not Status.success user.getMessage() contains the reason.

getOption

java.lang.String getOption(User user,
                           java.lang.String key)
Get the option value for key.

Parameters:
user - The user.
key - The option key.
Returns:
The value or null if there is not value for the key. If nulll then user.getMessage() contains the reason.
